comments.creator: MatsPalmgren_bugz@use.startmail.com
comments.author: MatsPalmgren_bugz@use.startmail.com
comments.text:
Follow-up from bug 690187.

Currently, in Fx 11, we simply suppress the marker if it doesn't
fit after the last remaining character on the line.
We should clip it like we do for atomic inline-level elements.
Fwiw, this is what IE10 also does.
comments.raw_text:
Follow-up from bug 690187.

Currently, in Fx 11, we simply suppress the marker if it doesn't
fit after the last remaining character on the line.
We should clip it like we do for atomic inline-level elements.
Fwiw, this is what IE10 also does.
